result.reason: The request is feasible and aligns with user customization needs. Existing logic already toggles between DockingWindow (tabs) and DockingSdi (no tabs) based on connection count; adding an explicit option to force DockingSdi (hiding tabs) is a straightforward extension.
result.approach: Add a new boolean setting 'HideConnectionTabs' (or 'NeverShowConnectionTabs') to Options > Tabs & Panels. Update `ConnectionWindow.ShowHideConnectionTabs` to set `DocumentStyle` to `DockingSdi` when this new setting is enabled, overriding the existing 'AlwaysShowConnectionTabs' logic and connection count checks.
